ygData.subject: Re: EQ expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/10/99 2:39:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, douglas@speakeasy.org writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/10/99 2:39:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
douglas@... writes:

<<
The plain (sic) of fear is already there. You just have to be 46th
level to get to it. And they're adding two continents, not one. And a
number of races. If you go to eq.stratics.com and check out the various
news articles you might find more solid information.
>>


I think they are adding one continent that is a bit larger than Faydwer but
smaller than Antonica. They are adding one new race (lizardman like race) a
bunch of new monsters, dramatically improved graphics including translucent
water and moving parts on buildings. About 15 total new zones.

Also, two new zones are soon to be added via patch.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
